Package ui.menu

Class TextBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.drawing.DrawableSection
      • ui.input.selection.DrawableSelectableSection
        • ui.input.selection.DrawableSelectableBufferedSection<DrawableBufferedSection>
          • ui.menu.TextBox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BufferedSection, PrintHandler, Section, SelectableBufferedSection, SelectableSection, SelectionHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OnlinePlayerConfig.PortBox
    public class TextBox
extends DrawableSelectableBufferedSection<DrawableBufferedSection>
    Represents a text input box.
    Represents a drawable selectable buffered section.
    Represents a selectable section that can be drawn to the terminal window.
    Represents a section that can be drawn to the terminal window.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      private class  TextBox.KeyHandler
      The TextInputKeyHandler for the TextBox class.
      A key handler for receiving user text input.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TextBox

        public TextBox​(int width,
               java.lang.String text,
               TerminalHandler handler,
               boolean enabled,
               java.lang.String allowedChars)
        Constructor for TextBox.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the text box.
        text - The initial text.
        handler - The TerminalHandler.
        enabled - Boolean; true if text box is enabled for selection.
        allowedChars - A regex pattern that typed characters must match to be allowed.

      • TextBox

               java.lang.String text,
               TerminalHandler handler,
               boolean enabled)
        Constructor for TextBox with default allowed characters.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the text box.
        text - The initial text.
        handler - The TerminalHandler.
        enabled - Boolean; true if text box is enabled for selection.

               TerminalHandler handler,
               boolean enabled)
        Constructor for TextBox with default allowed characters and no initial text.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the text box.
        handler - The TerminalHandler.
        enabled - Boolean; true if text box is enabled for selection.

    • Method Detail

      • focus

        public KeyHandler focus​(KeyHandler current)
        Called when this element is focused. If no handler is defined or section is not enabled call parent's focus method. If no parent is defined return current key handler. In this case used to use focused colour.
        Specified by:
        focus in interface SelectionHandler
        Overrides:
        focus in class DrawableSelectableSection
        Parameters:
        current - The current KeyHandler.
        Returns:
        The KeyHandler to return (normally this element's movement selection handler).

      • unfocus

        protected void unfocus()
        Called whenever focus is lost (i.e. from moving to next selection). In this case used to use unfocused colour.
        Specified by:
        unfocus in class DrawableSelectableSection

      • select

        public KeyHandler select​(KeyHandler current)
        Called when the user selects this element. In this case used to take over the key handler with a TextInputKeyHandler.
        Parameters:
        current - The current KeyHandler.
        Returns:
        The KeyHandler to return (could be a different key handler for e.g. entering text).

      • update

        public void update()
        Called before drawing the section. In this case pass to the underlying buffered section. In this case used to set the colours for everything.
        Specified by:
        update in interface Section
        Overrides:
        update in class DrawableSelectableBufferedSection<DrawableBufferedSection>

      • getText

        public java.lang.String getText()
        Getter for stored text.
        Returns:
        The stored text.

      • setText

        public void setText​(java.lang.String text)
        Setter for the stored text.
        Parameters:
        text - The new text.
